______

Ever dreamt of racing toy cars through your home, creating imaginative tracks, and sharing the excitement with fellow players?

Now it is all possible.
* 3 Unique Packs: Each with its own visual style, sound design, cars, and special pieces for unique gameplay.
* Arcade Mode: Race and conquer over 50 levels.
* New Car Physics: Experience guaranteed fun with our revamped car physics.
* Free Drive: Roam freely around your home with toy cars based on your room mesh.
* Custom Editor: Build tracks with simple blocks, special pieces, props, various materials, and more.
* Community Sharing: Share your tracks and compete against other players.
* Unlimited Community Levels: Endless possibilities created by the community.

The game is available on Quest 3, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

changelog.change_log: Added Quest 3 controller hints. Happy Track Crafting!
